ingredients.item: 2 essential Waitrose British Chicken Breasts, scored

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200ºC, gas mark 6.

Place the chicken in a small roasting tin, drizzle over 2 tsp oil and sprinkle with 1 tsp ground coriander and one third of the chopped leaves, roast for 25-30 minutes until cooked through, with no pink meat.
Meanwhile, cook the carrots in boiling water for 10-15 minutes until tender, drain and roughly crush, stir in the remaining oil, ground and chopped coriander, season and serve with the chicken.
